title: Chat is constantly being filled up by "() has purchased a control ward"
body: ..and its getting very annoying. Anyone else having this issue?

replies.body:
It's not a bug.

If anything you should be happy your team are buying pinks

Im in a practice tool atm and my chat is being spammed with "() has bought a control ward"

I dont mean "a name" by "()" . i mean that "()" is literally whats being spammed in the chat.

Ah, that on the other hand is a bug xD


Should clarify more

> [{quoted}](name=YaRossy,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=sMNWOoFt,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-04T01:26:46.896+0000)
>
> Ah, that on the other hand is a bug xD
> 
> 
> Should clarify more

he did quote it in title too
He didn't specify between a regular match where it's not a bug/bad thing or practice tool where it actually is a bug... so not really xD
